name: Rivals of Aether Replay
summary: An ROA file is a game replay created by Rivals of Aether, a fighting game available for Windows, Xbox One, and the Nintendo Switch. It contains plain text that details what happened in a Rivals of Aether match. Rivals of Aether uses the text an ROA file contains to reconstruct the match and play a replay.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
